attributes.action: Lower The Price Of  Freddo Bars Down Back To 10p.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever Since The Price Went Up 5p Due To THe Credit Crunch, A Lot Less People Have Purchased Them. I Personally Used to Purchase Several A day, But Nowadays I Buy None.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
